com.metsci.glimpse.support.font

Class SimpleTextLayoutCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metsci.glimpse.support.font.SimpleTextLayout
      • com.metsci.glimpse.support.font.SimpleTextLayoutCenter

  • public class SimpleTextLayoutCenter
extends SimpleTextLayout
    Lays out the text, centering along the horizontal and vertical axis. The center of each line of the text is at the center of the bounding box provided in doLayout(String, float, float, float, float). And the entire block of text is vertically centered in the same bounding box.
    Author:
    borkholder
